summary: Sangli-based Shiva Kumar re-locates to Mumbai to live with his brother, Daksh; Bhabi, Manasi; and their son. He gets recruited as a Sub-Inspector with Mumbai Police, and Manasi hopes that ... See full summary »
cast: Mohit Ahlawat|Priyanka Kothari|Vinod Jaywant|Nagesh Bhonsle|Zakir Hussain|Pankaj Jha|Ninad Kamat|Ravi Khanvilkar|Jaya Kolekar|Sanam Kumar|Dinesh Lamba|Laxman|Upendra Limaye|Pawan Mahendru|Raju Mavani|Ganesh Mayekar|Suchitra Pillai|Raam|Ranvir Shorey|Sherveer Vakil|Akshay Verma|Sanjeev Wilson
title: Shiva
